Just a quick note. How do we get the name of the current ssid name of the wifi-connection a
computer running some Linux-variant (like a Raspberry Pi running Raspbian) is connected to. In Python:

```{bash eval = FALSE}
import subprocess 
ssid = subprocess.check_output("iwgetid -r", shell=True) 
print(ssid)
```
